original_text: So that all which fell that day of Benjamin were twenty and five thousand men that drew the sword; all these were men of valour.
korean_text: 이 날에 베냐민 사람으로서 칼을 빼는 자가 엎드러진 것이 모두 이만 오천 명이니 다 용사였더라

sentences.original_text: So that all which fell that day of Benjamin
sentences.korean_translation: 그리하여 그 날 베냐민 지파에서 죽은 모든 사람이

sentences.original_text: were twenty and five thousand men that drew the sword
all these were men of valour
